name: Wedding Shoot
description: A pre-wedding shoot takes place any time before a couple's wedding date—even the day before! These sessions are not focused on ring shots, proposal recreations, or getting a picture for a newspaper announcement. You will get professional camera as long as with the professional photographer who will capture your best moment.

name: Wedding Film
description: A 15, 25 or 35-minute cinematic film that's set to music and includes extensive audio from the ceremony and/or reception. Editing style: may or may not be chronological; cinematic like a movie. Audio: music and parts of dialogue.You will get professional camera as long as with the professional photographer who will capture your best moment.

name: Engagement Shoot
description: An engagement photography session is when a professional photographer takes pictures of you and your fiancé in a casual setting, to capture your love and happiness genuinely.You will get professional camera as long as with the professional photographer who will capture your best moment.I hope you will stay with me after this sevices too.
